title: 04/02/2021 - HOUR 3 - Kyle Shanahan's Challenge, Adam Morrison, No Apologies
itunes:title: 04/02/2021 - HOUR 3 - Kyle Shanahan's Challenge, Adam Morrison, No Apologies
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--delves into San Francisco head coach Kyle Shanahan's biggest challenge yet. Also, two-time NBA champion and former Gonzaga All-American Adam Morrison joins Doug to discuss this year's unstoppable Gonzaga team as well as his emotional exit from the NCAA Tournament. Finally, Best For Last: "I Will No Longer Apologize For..."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
